issue.title: ✨ [Prototype] Add video trailer support to amp img component
issue.body:
Hello, this is an attempt(prototype) to add support to play trailers when touchstart event happens on the amp-img component. Trailers are usually short videos that could represent a full video and you can much faster check if a full video is suitable for you. For example, you could see such behavior on youtube, when you hover over any videos in the videos list it starts to play.

If this implementation doesn't suitable please give instructions it will be very helpful. Thank you.
/cc @erwinmombay 
/cc @jridgewell

issue.title: ♿ 🐛 [Story a11y] When drawer is open hide content outside of drawer
issue.body:
This allows for a screen reader experience that matches the intended UX by not allowing the content behind the draggable drawer to be readable.

Fixes #38433

A note that `aria-modal=true` should hide content underneath the dialog however in [this example](https://codepen.io/philipbell/live/jOxbjOV) The "Add Delivery Address" button is still selectable when the modal is open.
https://www.w3.org/WAI/ARIA/apg/example-index/dialog-modal/dialog
Other examples [work with tabbing](https://codepen.io/anqa/full/EEdOQY) but not with screen readers.
For this reason I used `aria-hidden` and `tab-index`.

issue.title: ✨ [Prototype] Add video trailer support to amp img component
issue.body:
Hello, this is an attempt(prototype) to add support to play trailers when touchstart event happens on the amp-img component. Trailers are usually short videos that could represent a full video and you can much faster check if a full video is suitable for you. For example, you could see such behavior on youtube, when you hover over any videos in the videos list it starts to play.

If this implementation doesn't suitable please give instructions it will be very helpful. Thank you.
/cc @erwinmombay 
/cc @jridgewell

issue.title: ♿ 🐛 [Story a11y] When drawer is open hide content outside of drawer
issue.body:
This allows for a screen reader experience that matches the intended UX by not allowing the content behind the draggable drawer to be readable.

Fixes #38433

A note that `aria-modal=true` should hide content underneath the dialog however in [this example](https://codepen.io/philipbell/live/jOxbjOV) The "Add Delivery Address" button is still selectable when the modal is open.
https://www.w3.org/WAI/ARIA/apg/example-index/dialog-modal/dialog
Other examples [work with tabbing](https://codepen.io/anqa/full/EEdOQY) but not with screen readers.
For this reason I used `aria-hidden` and `tab-index`.

issue.title: ✨ [Prototype] Add video trailer support to amp img component
issue.body:
Hello, this is an attempt(prototype) to add support to play trailers when touchstart event happens on the amp-img component. Trailers are usually short videos that could represent a full video and you can much faster check if a full video is suitable for you. For example, you could see such behavior on youtube, when you hover over any videos in the videos list it starts to play.

If this implementation doesn't suitable please give instructions it will be very helpful. Thank you.
/cc @erwinmombay 
/cc @jridgewell

issue.title: ♿ 🐛 [Story a11y] When drawer is open hide content outside of drawer
issue.body:
This allows for a screen reader experience that matches the intended UX by not allowing the content behind the draggable drawer to be readable.

Fixes #38433

A note that `aria-modal=true` should hide content underneath the dialog however in [this example](https://codepen.io/philipbell/live/jOxbjOV) The "Add Delivery Address" button is still selectable when the modal is open.
https://www.w3.org/WAI/ARIA/apg/example-index/dialog-modal/dialog
Other examples [work with tabbing](https://codepen.io/anqa/full/EEdOQY) but not with screen readers.
For this reason I used `aria-hidden` and `tab-index`.
